bibl.title: Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. XX. Research 2008.
bibl.author: Babraj Daszewski Godlewski Redlak
bibl.note: Nécrologie: Hanna Szymańska (1944-2010) [pp. 19-20, par Krzysztof Babraj]. - Rapports d'activités en Égypte (Alexandrie, Maréa, Marina el-Alamein, Tell el-Retaba, Tell el-Farkha [Ghazala], Tell el-Murra, Saqqara, Deir el-Bahari, Sheikh Abd el-Gurna, Oasis de Dakhleh), au Soudan, à Chypre, au Liban et en Syrie. - Contributions diverses [dont: Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski, Graeco-Roman Town and Necropolis in Marina el-Alamein, pp. 421-456, figg.; - Włodzimierz Godlewski, In the Shade of the Nekloni monastery (Deir Malak Gubrail, Fayum), pp. 467-482, figg.; - Małgorzata Redlak, Ornaments on Funerary Stelae of the 9th-12th Centuries from Egypt - Josef Strzygowski's Publication Anew, pp. 561-574, figg.].
bibl.seg: Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. XX. Research 2008.
Warsaw, University of Warsaw, Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology, 2011, 8°, 636 pp., figg. ISBN 978-83-235-0821-2. 63 zł.

Nécrologie: Hanna Szymańska (1944-2010) [pp. 19-20, par Krzysztof Babraj]. - Rapports d'activités en Égypte (Alexandrie, Maréa, Marina el-Alamein, Tell el-Retaba, Tell el-Farkha [Ghazala], Tell el-Murra, Saqqara, Deir el-Bahari, Sheikh Abd el-Gurna, Oasis de Dakhleh), au Soudan, à Chypre, au Liban et en Syrie. - Contributions diverses [dont: Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski, Graeco-Roman Town and Necropolis in Marina el-Alamein, pp. 421-456, figg.; - Włodzimierz Godlewski, In the Shade of the Nekloni monastery (Deir Malak Gubrail, Fayum), pp. 467-482, figg.; - Małgorzata Redlak, Ornaments on Funerary Stelae of the 9th-12th Centuries from Egypt - Josef Strzygowski's Publication Anew, pp. 561-574, figg.].
